title: Log a Found Item
description: A cleaner finds a cell phone in the seating area after an event and turns it in to guest services.

tasks.description: Receive the found cell phone from the staff member.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent takes possession of the item.

tasks.description: Create a new 'found item' record in the lost and found database.
Describe the item in detail (model, color, lock screen image) and the location it was found.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent enters a detailed description to help with matching it to a lost report.

tasks.description: Place the item in the secure storage area and note the storage location in the database record.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent secures the item and logs its physical location.
